task.title: How to create a Volvo ID
task.shortdesc: To use Volvo services connected to the vehicle, such as via the Volvo Cars app, a Volvo ID must be created.

stepsection.b: How to create a Volvo ID with the Volvo Cars app

step.cmd: Download the latest version of the Volvo Cars app 1 to your phone.
Download the latest version of the Volvo Cars app 1 to your phone.
Choose to create a Volvo ID.
The website for creating a Volvo ID will appear.
Enter a personal email address or cell phone number.
Follow the instructions that will be sent automatically to this email address/cell phone number.

stepresult.p: A Volvo ID is created and ready for use.

stepsection.b: Creating a Volvo ID on the Volvo Cars website

ol.li: Go to volvoid.eu.volvocars.com/Account. Choose to create a Volvo ID.
Enter a personal email address or cell phone number.
Follow the instructions that will be sent automatically to this email address/cell phone number.

stepsection.p: A Volvo ID is created and ready for use.
[1]Can be downloaded from e.g. the Apple App Store or Google Play.
